title: Blueprint, "Villa of M. Hemsy, St. Cloud, Plan du Premier Etage", 1913
signed: Signed upper right corner: L'architect Hector Guimard
inscribed:
Top: PROPREITE DE MSR. HEMSY/ A ST. CLOUD
Below top inscription, center: PLAN DU/ PREMIER ETAGE
description: Floor plan for the first floor of the Villa of Monsieur Hemsy at St. Cloud. Function and scale of rooms noted thruoghout the design. In the background, an intricate abstract floral design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Villa of M. Hemsy, St. Cloud, Plan du Premier Etage", 1913.
1913. Blueprint. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-21.
